title: Calling Someone Daddy?
body:
Is calling someone daddy a reportable offense ?

Had numerous people been called daddy and love the sensual innuendo

So wasnt sure if its portrayed as a word of bad unsportsmanlike conduct

replies.body: put it in as hate speech, write your feelings about being called daddy and how harmful it is, and let riot decide. Personally I don't care about it, but if you're fragile enough to have it keep you awake at night, why not. Mute functions are there for a reason.

The pedophile would love to be called that. 

If a girl call a guy daddy, you can be sure the relationship is mostly a sexual transaction.

>So wasnt sure if its portrayed as a word of bad unsportsmanlike conduct

It isnt exactly " bad unsportsmanlike conduct", if the person being called like it. But on a personal view; I would see you as a person with daddy issue and more than likely see me as a $$ bag.
